trends: There has been one other sighting in Stanfield
There were no other sightings in Stanfield on or around January 15th 2008
Summary: Subject was driving home and saw blinking lights hovering, then went in the direction of Tucson to the south
divs: Sighting DetailsThis report is being submitted by FI Christine Dickey for Palmer Miller. The subject was driving home from work and saw three red blinking lights. He managed to get it on video, but only two of the lights are apparent and one is evident, but difficult to judge. The object was above the telephone poles about 150 ft up hovering, but then went in the direction of Tucson to the south. More detailed information needs to be gotten for the report.
